verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Come bless the Lord
All you servants of the Lord
Who stand by night
In the house of the Lord

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lift up your hands
In the holy place
And bless the Lord
and bless the Lord
and bless the Lord
